results.content:
I think this course is not enough for the technology has today.
I recommend to use state management like recoil.
and use a difference socket architecture structure

response.content:
Hi, thank you very much for your valuable feedback and suggestions. As I have updated my course with React hooks, I didn't use any external state management library. As far as the architecture is considered, in my experience I have seen people implement the architecture as per their convenience like MVC, MVP or MVVM etc.

If you propose something different, please share your views about what kind of architecture you will propose. Also note that this course is all about using Socket IO in front end and hence less react and more socket IO.

results.content: The most confusing course that I've ever seen. Lots of unnecessary outdated information, ocean of useless information. Every lecture you see the explanation of how to open the file in vscode. Waste of money.

response.content: I am really sorry that the course didn't meet your expectations. May I know which information is outdated? Also, which file or project should I open while working with the projects, I have shown in VS code. So that when you start practicing, you should not be confused. Thank you for your feedback.
